title: Why should I pay any freelancer company to post a project on their website? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is simple. You can leverage the following when you post your project on a freelance website You can select from a wide pool of freelancers with different price and service offering.While selecting a freelqncer, you can check out their feedback and ratings to find out the best fit for your project.If the freelancer does not deliver as per the schedule or agreed quality, you can opt for a refund.You can always find a complete pool of freelacer resources to outsource almost any work or service you need in a cheap rate with reasonable quality assurance without building the in house competency in your company. This allows you to scale ypur business without upfront capital investment.However, there are a few down sides of using freelance services as well. But as all things in life this too comes with a price. If you are ready to invest time and money then go for in house skill development. If you are looking for quick and easy wins, then go for freelancing.
You're paying for access, just like printing a help wanted ad in the paper.
